short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Calculates and shows GPA for PowerSchool BCA

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension was made for Bergen County Academies students to check their GPA on PowerSchool. This is the latest version of the extension, use this instead of BCA GPA 2019, as that does not work anymore.
